org.apache.derbyTesting.junit

Class DataSourceConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.derbyTesting.junit.DataSourceConnector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Connector

    public class DataSourceConnector
extends java.lang.Object
implements Connector
    Connection factory using javax.sql.DataSource. Should work for an Derby data source, including JSR169 support.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private TestConfiguration config 
      private javax.sql.DataSource ds
      DataSource that maps to the database for the configuration.

    • Field Detail

      • config

        private TestConfiguration config

      • ds

        private javax.sql.DataSource ds
        DataSource that maps to the database for the configuration. The no-arg getConnection() method maps to the default user and password for the configuration.

      • shutDatabase

        public void shutDatabase()
                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Description copied from interface: Connector
        Shutdown the running default database using user and password defined by the configuration passed to setConfiguration. Return nothing, exception is expected to be thrown with SQLState 08006
        Specified by:
        shutDatabase in interface Connector
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • shutEngine

        public void shutEngine(boolean deregisterDriver)
                throws java.sql.SQLException
        Description copied from interface: Connector
        Shutdown the running derby engine (not the network server). This method can only be called when the engine is running embedded in this JVM. Return nothing, exception is expected to be thrown with SQLState XJ015
        Specified by:
        shutEngine in interface Connector
        Parameters:
        deregisterDriver - if true, deregister driver
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
